name: prod
description: The program should calculate the product of all the elements of the array b and store it in p. Note that the product of 0 elements is equal to 1.
simplifyPrefix: (BG_PUSH (FORALL (a b) (EQ (* a b) (* b a)))) (BG_PUSH (FORALL (b i j)  (AND (IMPLIES (> i j) (EQ (prod b i j) 1) ) (IMPLIES (<= i j) (EQ (prod b i j) (* (select b j) (prod b i (- j 1))))))))
